A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Please take control away from Johnson! He has singlehandedly changed the mythology of the Star Was universe (in a bad way)\, threw away some great characters\, and stole every great moment from the original trilogy in his attempt to create a “new” Star Wars mythology. There are so many flaws in this film my fingers would cramp up trying to type them all. Safe to say if Disney is REALLY listening to the fans PLEASE bring back Lawrence Kasdan to write with JJ and MAYBE they can salvage this franchise. IF Disney is listening. Anyone who is saying this film is in the same league as “Empire” truly needs to have their head examined. Everything “The Force Awakens” built up\, this film destroyed!
